document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2004-01
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON APPROVING ZONING ORDINANCE AND MAP AMENDMENT 03-01 TO AMEND ZONING ORDINANCE CHAPTER 19.11, TABLE 2 REGARDING DEVELOPMENT STANDARDS FOR HOTELS, AND AMEND THE OFFICIAL ZONING MAP TO RECLASSIFY NAPA JUNCTION PARCELS 3 AND A TO RESIDENTIAL HIGH 2 (RH-2)
